parameters.name: SourceIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where SourceTranslatedAddress  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by SourceTranslatedAddress
| project Value = SourceTranslatedAddress, Label = strcat(SourceTranslatedAddress, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: DestinationIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceEventClassID  !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where DestinationIP  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP
| project Value = DestinationIP, Label = strcat(DestinationIP, " count: ", Count)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where DestinationServiceName !=""
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationServiceName
| order by Count desc
content.title: Apps being accessed

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where DestinationServiceName !=""
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where DestinationServiceName == '{DestinationServiceNameFilter}' or '{DestinationServiceNameFilter}' == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationServiceName, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Apps being accessed over time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where DeviceEventClassID contains "Allow"
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where DestinationServiceName has_any ("Microsoft", "Skype", "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Outlook", "office.com", "Sharepoint Online", "Microsoft Forms", "Microsoft Azure")
| summarize Count = count()  by DestinationServiceName
content.title: Microsoft services

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "devicemodel=" devicemodel
| where devicemodel != ""  and    devicemodel !startswith "NA"
| summarize count() by devicemodel
content.title: Devices

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "Allowed" or DeviceEventClassID == "Allow"
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| summarize Downloads = sum( ReceivedBytes)/1024.0/1024.0 , Uploads = sum( SentBytes)/1024.0/1024.0 by Location = SourceUserPrivileges
content.title: Upload and download data in MB, by location - click to filter

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "Allowed" or DeviceEventClassID == "Allow"
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where SourceUserPrivileges == '{LocationFilter}' or '{LocationFilter}' == "All"
| summarize Downloads = sum( ReceivedBytes)/1024.0/1024.0 , Uploads = sum( SentBytes)/1024.0/1024.0 by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Upload and download data in MB over time

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where ApplicationProtocol !=""
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog";
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by ApplicationProtocol
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by ApplicationProtocol
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on ApplicationProtocol
| order by TotalCount desc, ApplicationProtocol asc
| project ApplicationProtocol, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by RequestMethod , ApplicationProtocol
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by ApplicationProtocol, RequestMethod 
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on ApplicationProtocol, RequestMethod 
| order by TotalCount desc, ApplicationProtocol asc
| project ApplicationProtocol, RequestMethod , TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on ApplicationProtocol
| project Id, Name = RequestMethod , Type = 'RequestMethod', ['ApplicationProtocol Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = ApplicationProtocol, Type = 'ApplicationProtocol', ['ApplicationProtocol Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['ApplicationProtocol Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Protocols and methods

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "Allowed"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where RequestMethod != "" 
| where RequestMethod != "None" 
| summarize count() by RequestMethod
content.title: Allowed HTTP methods

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where SourceUserPrivileges == "Road Warrior" 
| summarize URLS_BLOCKED = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), Activity
content.title: Block reasons for road warriors

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where SourceUserPrivileges != "" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationHostName
| top 10 by Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top blocked domains for HTTP/S requests

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where SourceUserPrivileges != SourceUserName
| summarize Count = count() by SourceUserName
| top 10 by Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top blocked users for HTTP/S requests

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| sort by Count 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Block Reasons for HTTP/S Requests

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where SourceUserPrivileges != "" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and  (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
| where (DestinationHostName == '{DestinationHostName}' or '{DestinationHostName}' == "All") and (SourceUserName == '{SourceUserName}' or '{SourceUserName}' == "All") and (Activity == '{Activity}' or '{Activity}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationHostName, SourceUserName, Activity, DestinationIP, Location = SourceUserPrivileges
| order by Count desc
content.title: Block activities summary
